attributes.action: Allow a car boot sale in the green belt to happen more than 14 days per year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We go on about recycling, please tell me what is more efficient than recycling your unwanted items than buring that in land fill sites.
A good day out for people and if run properly, a safe and clean way of raising extra cash and emptying your garage.
